languages.text: На мире Эпитафия Ирлиэт Ланэвисс завершила свой Путь Изгоя. Бесстрашно обратив оружие против мон-кай, подтвердивше{mf|го|й} дурную славу своей ущербной расы, она погибла с честью, как полагается воительнице благородного народа.

It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.
languages.original_text: На мире Эпитафия Ирлиэт Ланэвисс завершила свой Путь Изгоя. Бесстрашно обратив оружие против мон-кай, подтвердивше{mf|го|й} дурную славу своей ущербной расы, она погибла с честью, как полагается воительнице благородного народа.

traits.locale_text: It was on a world named Epitaph where Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh, who confirmed the ill fame of {mf|his|her} inferior race, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble people.

It was on a world named Epitaph where Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh, who confirmed the ill fame of {mf|his|her} inferior race, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble people.

It was on a world named Epitaph where Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh, who confirmed the ill fame of {mf|his|her} inferior race, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble people.

It was on a world named Epitaph where Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh, who confirmed the ill fame of {mf|his|her} inferior race, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble people.

It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

languages.text: 在荒垄碑碣，伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝走完了她的流浪者道途。身为高贵族人之中的战士，她勇敢地将武器对准了那只暴露出了卑劣本性的猴子，光荣赴死。
languages.original_text: It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

traits.locale_text: 在荒垄碑碣，伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝走完了她的流浪者道途。身为她高贵族人中的战士，她勇敢地将武器对准了那只露出了卑劣本性的猴子，光荣赴死。

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss beendete ihren Pfad der Ausgestoßenen auf Epitaph. Sie richtete ihre Waffe tapfer gegen den Chem-Pan-Sey, der den bösen Ruf seiner niederen Spezies bestätigt hatte, und starb ehrenvoll, wie es sich für eine Kriegerin ihres noblen Volks geziemt.
languages.original_text: It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss beendete ihren Pfad der Ausgestoßenen auf einer Welt namens Epitaph. Sie richtete ihre Waffe tapfer gegen den Chem-Pan-Sey, der den bösen Ruf seiner niederen Spezies bestätigt hatte, und starb ehrenvoll, wie es sich für eine Kriegerin ihres noblen Volks geziemt.

languages.text: Ce fut sur Épitaphe qu'Yrliet Lanaevyss acheva son cheminement sur la Voie de l'Errance. Elle affronta courageusement {mf|le|la} mon-keigh, qui avait confirmé la fourberie de sa race inférieure, et mourut au champ d'honneur, comme il sied à une guerrière de son noble peuple.
languages.original_text: It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

traits.locale_text: C'est dans un monde nommé Épitaphe qu'Yrliet Lanaevyss acheva son cheminement sur la Voie de l'Errance. Elle affronta courageusement {mf|le|la} mon-keigh, qui avait confirmé la fourberie de sa race inférieure, et mourut sur le champ d'honneur, comme il sied à une guerrière de son noble peuple.

languages.text: Fue en Epitafio donde Yrliet Lanaevyss completó su Senda del Proscrito. Dirigiendo su arma hacia {mf|el|la} mon-keigh, que demostró que la infamia de su raza inferior era merecida, la Aeldari murió con honor, tal y como corresponde a una guerrera de su noble pueblo.
languages.original_text: It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

traits.locale_text: Fue en un mundo llamado Epitafio donde Yrliet Lanaevyss completó su Senda del Proscrito. Dirigiendo su arma hacia {mf|el|la} mon-keigh, que confirmó la mala fama de su raza inferior, la Aeldari murió con honor, tal y como corresponde a una guerrera de su noble pueblo.

languages.text: ユリエット・ラナエフィスが追放者の道を完遂したのは、エピタフでのことだった。劣った種族の悪評が妥当なものであることを証明したモン＝ケイに対して勇敢にも武器を向けた彼女は、高貴な種族の戦士にふさわしい名誉の死を遂げた。
languages.original_text: It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

traits.locale_text: ユリエット・ラナエフィスが追放者の道を完遂したのは、エピタフでのことだった。劣った種族の悪評が妥当なものであることを証明したモン＝ケイに対して勇敢にも武器を向けた彼女は、高貴な種族の戦士にふさわしい名誉の死を遂げた。

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss, Yurtsuzun Yolu'nu Sinyazıt'ta tamamladı. Silahını, aşağılık ırkının sahip olduğu kötü namın boşuna olmadığını ispatlayan mon-keigh'e cesurca doğrulttu ve onun gibi soylu bir savaşçıya yakışır biçimde, onuruyla öldü.
languages.original_text: It was on Epitaph that Yrliet Lanaevyss completed her Path of the Outcast. Valiantly turning her weapon against the mon-keigh who had proven the ill repute of {mf|his|her} inferior race was warranted, she died with honour, as befits a warrior of her noble kind.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss, Yurtsuzun Yolu'nu Kitabe'de tamamladı. Silahını, aşağılık ırkının sahip olduğu kötü namın boşuna olmadığını ispatlayan mon-keigh'e cesurca doğrultarak, onun gibi soylu bir savaşçıya yakışır biçimde, onuruyla öldü.
